response.original_title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Two Towers (Extended Edition)
response.overview: The second in a trilogy of films beloved by many, from the original books by renowned author, J.R.R.Tolkien, and directed by the infamous Peter Jackson. Fans of the films worldwide consider the extended editions of the Peter Jackson films to be the definitive versions. With the fellowship separated, Frodo and Sam encounter the creature Gollum and learn the past of The One Ring as they go on in their journey to Mordor. But the evil Sauron and The Wizard Saruman are in their way of destroying the evil that reaks havoc upon Middle Earth.
response.tagline: The Extended Edition of Peter Jackson's second Lord Of The Rings movie
response.title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Two Towers (Extended Edition)
